title: I lose LP when i win
body: I was at 7 LP bronze IV, i just did a game and win it, i was supposed to win 11 LP but instead i lose LP and im currently at -1 LP! That not the first time that happen, i know my MMR is low, but why do i lose LP when im supposed to win ?

replies.body: Hey there, it looks like you had a queue dodge which dropped your LP by 10.  Normally a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) would lose 3 LP but your account has been rapidly dodging (6 in a day) which has escalated your timer and LP loss.  You may want to take a break from dodging friend, that's quite a bit!
Ok thanks you, and i have a other question, do dodging make my MMR lower ?
